mapper.sql: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DTL.REQ_DTL_SEQ) AS rowNum , DTL.REQ_SEQ AS reqSeq , DTL.REQ_NO AS reqNo , DTL.REQ_DTL_SEQ AS reqDtlSeq , DTL.REQ_DTL_NO AS reqDtlNo , DTL.REQ_DTL_NM AS reqDtlNm , DTL.REQ_DTL_CONTENT_TXT AS reqDtlContentTxt , DTL.DTL_SITE_GB_CD AS dtlSiteGbCd , CODE1.CODE_NM AS dtlSiteGb , DTL.REQ_GB_CD AS reqGbCd , CODE2.CODE_NM AS reqGb , DTL.SITE_GB_CD_STR AS siteGbCdStr , DTL.REQ_DTL_STAT_CD AS reqDtlStatCd , CODE3.CODE_NM AS reqDtlStat , DTL.REQ_DTL_STAT_CMT AS reqDtlStatCmt , DTL.TGT_YMD AS tgtYmd , DTL.TGT_MM AS tgtMm , DTL.MNG_OK_YMD AS mngOkYmd , DTL.MNG_OK_SEQ AS mngOkSeq , DTL.CUS_OK_YMD AS cusOkYmd , DTL.CUS_OK_SEQ AS cusOkSeq , DTL.RETURN_YMD AS returnYmd , DTL.RETURN_SEQ AS returnSeq , DTL.REQ_DTL_SCORE AS reqDtlScore , DTL.REQ_DTL_EVAL_COTENT_CMT AS reqDtlEvalCotentCmt , DATE_FORMAT(DTL.DEL_DT, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS delDt , DTL.DEL_YN AS delYn , DATE_FORMAT(DTL.REG_DT, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS regDt , REG_USER.USER_NM AS regNm , DATE_FORMAT(DTL.UPDT_DT, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS updtDt , UPDT_USER.USER_NM AS updtNm FROM TB_REQ_DTL DTL INNER JOIN TB_REQ REQ ON DTL.REQ_SEQ = REQ.REQ_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_CODE CODE1 ON DTL.DTL_SITE_GB_CD = CODE1.CODE_CD AND CODE1.UP_CODE_CD = 'DTL_SITE_GB_CD' LEFT JOIN TB_CODE CODE2 ON DTL.REQ_DTL_STAT_CD = CODE2.CODE_CD AND CODE2.UP_CODE_CD = 'REQ_DTL_STAT_CD' LEFT JOIN TB_CODE CODE3 ON DTL.REQ_GB_CD = CODE3.CODE_CD AND CODE3.UP_CODE_CD = 'REQ_GB_CD' LEFT JOIN TB_USER REG_USER ON DTL.REG_SEQ = REG_USER.USER_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_USER UPDT_USER ON DTL.UPDT_SEQ = UPDT_USER.USER_SEQ WHERE DTL.DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.select: AND DTL.REQ_SEQ = #{reqSeq} ORDER BY DTL.REQ_DTL_SEQ DESC
